scripts.clean-install: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path node_modules) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules } ; if (Test-Path package-lock.json) { Remove-Item -Force package-lock.json } ; npm cache clean --force ; npm install"
scripts.fix-ebadf: npm run verify-cache && npm run clean-install
scripts.test: echo "No tests configured. Run npm run setupTests to prepare tests." && exit 0
